summary: I am a French Legal counsel and Data privacy Expert of an international company based in the Netherlands. After obtaining a master’s degree in Business Law from the University of Paris Dauphine, I have decided to work in several business law firms before applying abroad and specializing myself on data privacy and data protection matters. After almost three years of practice, I am convinced that a company, to be and to remain sustainable, needs to embrace data privacy regulation and see data privacy as a lever of development and not as a burden. Therefore, my role as a privacy legal counsel is to support innovation and development of a company by bringing my expertise from the beginning of the project until its concrete realization.

'company': 'ETS Global B.V.', 'description': '- Providing legal compliance support and advice to business and legal teams, including the application of European privacy legislation, in particular, the GDPR and data transfer requirements
- Supporting the review and negotiation of customer contracts and responding to customer privacy questionnaires and audits
- Developing and conducting privacy impact assessments, legitimate interest balancing tests, and transfer impact assessments
- Guide on how best to ensure data protection by design and default is baked into the design, build, test and deployment stages of all activities
- Drive compliance efforts relating to global privacy and data protection regulations, but in particular in the EU and Asia-Pacific
- Review, triage and investigate complex privacy inquiries and draft responses to provide high-quality customer support and timely solutions to build customer trust
- Counsel on privacy and security incident preparedness and management
- Research and track global privacy legislation, evolving regulations, and enforcement and translating that into practical advice
- Update and maintain external privacy notices, internal privacy and data handling policies, playbooks, and other materials supporting ETS’s privacy program', 'title': 'Legal Counsel & Data Protection Specialist', 'employment_type': None}, {'location': 'Région de Amsterdam, Pays-Bas', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'company': 'ETS Global B.V.', 'description': '• Advise the company and clients with respect to all matters pertaining to data protection and privacy in order to promote compliance with relevant laws and regulations (training, advice based on privacy policies, procedures and strategies, advice on privacy and data security issues related to new products and services, contract review, drafting and negotiations with internal and external customers, suppliers, service providers or partners, from a data protection and privacy perspective, performance of data privacy risk assessments and monitor of internal controls,...)
• Support to the Legal Affairs Department (mainly the commercial team in France, Europe and China) and for the American parent company of ETS Global
• Drafting and reviewing legal documents (contracts, amendments, memorandum of understanding, legal letters in both French and English)
• Preparation of legal documents according to the law (General Terms and Conditions of sale, Privacy Policy, Website compliance ...)
• Participation in substantial day-to-day deals and completion of regulatory formalities
• Legal support to the other departments such as the Marketing department, the CS department, the IT department, and the Security department
• Preparation of replies to invitations to tender and other public procurement procedures
• Administrative support of the legal department (formalities, registrations with the registry and chambers of commerce abroad)', 'title': 'Junior Legal Counsel', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 4422, 'name': 'DLA Piper', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E0BAQEm2M2yEgoXAg/company-logo_400_400/0/1688371767407?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=70J5ksGzs-zoJhBVvYzwEyZJEK1mJUaw63zGMVtCyvc', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/dla-piper/', 'employees': {'start': 5001, 'end': 10000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Région de Paris, France', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'DLA Piper', 'description': '• Communication: drafting internal and external communications and marketing collateral (writing and managing campaign content, including emails, newsletters, advertisements, press release); digital communication (websites, Linkedin, Twitter, and Instagram)

• Participation in the drafting and implementation of due diligence for potential transactions
• Participation in substantial day-to-day deals and completion of regulatory formalities
• Participation in the drafting of corporate agreements
• Assistance in completing all documents required when creating various business entities
• Redaction of articles published on Simon & Associés's website and legal publications in the legal press


-----

- Participation à la rédaction et au suivi des audits juridiques dans le cadre d’opérations d’acquisitions
- Participation à la rédaction de la documentation juridique dans le cadre d’opérations de capital investissement (augmentations de capital, émissions de valeurs mobilières, pactes d’actionnaires)
- Rédaction d’actes relatifs à la vie sociale des sociétés (statuts, approbation des comptes, tenue des registres d’assemblées, transfert de siège, accomplissement des formalités, pouvoirs ...)
- Recherches et analyses de problématiques en droit des sociétés 
- Participation à la rédaction de documents juridiques (acte de cession de fonds de commerce, garantie de passif, déclaration de créances, ...)
- Rédaction d’articles publiés dans la Lettre des Réseaux – Simon Associés :
    • Coup d’accordéon et omission du rapport préalable du commissaire aux comptes (Cass. com., 15  mars 2017, n°15-50.021)
